name: Desert Rescue
summary:
《Desert Rescue》 is a third-person shooting game, Desert scene, high-precision model; May use the gun kind weapon, the sword, the hand thunder; The main task is to protect friendly forces and themselves, eliminate zombies, aliens, enemy troops; This game is a single-player shooting adventure survival game, detailed picture, realistic model, find friends, supplies, weapons in the desert, exterminate the enemy struggle to survive! 
WASD controls movement, 
F talk, pick up objects, etc. 
Left mouse button shooting 
Right-click aiming 
Switch weapons with The mouse wheel
